meanings.definition: A group consisting of parents and children living together in a household.
meanings.sent1: My family eats dinner together every night.
meanings.sent2: The Smith family went on a vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The family of ducks waddled across the pond.
meanings.sent4: The family of trees provided shade in the park.
meanings.sent5: The family of colors in the sunset painted the sky beautifully.

meanings.definition: All the descendants of a common ancestor.
meanings.sent1: Our family reunion brought together relatives from near and far.
meanings.sent2: The royal family has a long history of traditions.
meanings.sent3: The family of books on the shelf seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: The family of stars in the night sky sparkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The family of flavors in the dish created a delicious blend.

meanings.sent1: The furniture store had a family of matching bedroom sets.
meanings.sent2: The family of cars in the parking lot all had red paint.
meanings.sent3: The family of clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: The family of shapes in the puzzle fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The family of instruments in the orchestra played in harmony.
